title: Conference Report: WorldCALL2023
content:
In November of this year, IAFOR hosted WorldCALL2023 – CALL in Critical Times in Chiang Mai, Thailand, bringing together 100 onsite delegates and over 50 virtual participants for meaningful dialogue onComputer-Assisted Language Learning (CALL).
